channel.title: ~All About Hamachi~
channel.description:
I have seen many topics on how to use hamachi and make servers on it. So here is my little guide :D.Please post here if this helped ;D.
Part I- [u]~Downloading Hamachi~[/u]
Go to this link to download Hamachi,
https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/download.asp
[u]~Getting On Hamachi Servers~[/u]
Open up Hamachi and click on the triangle on the bottom right corner. Select "Join an existing network". Put the network name and password there. Now enter the port and ip on Moparscape and you should be able to log onto the owners server, if he/she is online!
Part II- [u]~Creating A Hamachi Server~[/u]
Once again, go to the triangle in Hamachi but select "Create a new network". Now make your network name and pass there.
Now you need Java, JDK 6u1 get it here,
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
Now download winRAR here,
http://rarlabs.com/download.htm
Open up winRAR and open up your source then extract it .Now go to where you extracted it, your source should be there.
First, go here to copy the code into your compiler,
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html
Follow the guide.
Now compile and you should have no errors.
Now run it and your server should be up.
On Hamachi,there should be an ip number at the top of it. That's how others connect to your server. You connect through 0.0.0.0. (localhost).
Edited: PI [color=green]C[/color][color=orange]S[/color]
Part I-
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/5236/untitledjn5.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/571/untitledag3.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img211.imageshack.us/img211/8531/untitledfl9.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img245.imageshack.us/img245/1349/untitled15kz2.png[/img][/URL]
Part II-
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/2552/untitledco0.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img181.imageshack.us/img181/3582/untitled27uf3.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img181.imageshack.us/img181/8131/untitled21hx5.png[/img][/URL]
Hope This Helps :D.

item.title: ~All About Hamachi~
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

I have seen many topics on how to use hamachi and make servers on it. So here is my little guide :D.Please post here if this helped ;D.

Part I-
~Downloading Hamachi~

                     Go to this link to download Hamachi,

                     https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/download.asp

                     [u]~Getting On Hamachi Servers~[/u]

                     Open up Hamachi and click on the triangle on the bottom right corner.

Select “Join an existing network”. Put the network name and password there. Now enter the port and ip on Moparscape and you should be able to log onto the owners server, if he/she is online!

Part II-
~Creating A Hamachi Server~

                      Once again, go to the triangle in Hamachi but select "Create a new network". Now make your network name and pass there.

                       Now you need Java, JDK 6u1 get it here,
         
                       http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

                       Now download winRAR here,

                       http://rarlabs.com/download.htm

                       Open up winRAR and open up your source then extract it

.Now go to where you extracted it, your source should be there.

                    First, go here to copy the code into your compiler,

                    http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html

                    Follow the guide.

                    Now compile and you should have no errors.

                    Now run it and your server should be up.

                   

                  

                    On Hamachi,there should be an ip number at the top of it. That's how others connect to your server. You connect through 0.0.0.0. (localhost).
